text:
With 7️⃣ billion people on the planet 🌍🌎🌏, not everyone will be able to get the #Covid19 #vaccine at the same time. 

Vaccinating everyone will take months. Until then, we all need to keep taking precautions. To learn more send the word “COVID19VAX” 👉 https://t.co/ZGChh6Zxv7 https://t.co/QXL4FMDDFO
